page.title: 06INTERVIEW WITH MR. THOMSON
page.content: {Mr. Thomson has lived in Ladybank all {his life.}He went to{Ladybank School from the age of{5 to 14. His teachers {were VERY,VERY strict.}He remembers a {game}called{"CRUSTS & CRUMBS". The most {popular item in his shop was his {"BROWN BREAD".}The recipe was passed down from his father. Mr. Thomson had to sell his shop in 1983. No one bought the shop{but the brown bread {recipe was sold to major bread {company. He has seen a great many {shops close since his childhood.
